application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 10b (Details of the final surface finishes) in respect of Construction Stage 1 only of the development as shown on the approved Construction Staging Plan (Ref: BXS-PK001-INF000-C-WIE-DR-11-P911-X); partial discharge of Condition 11 (detailed designs of the kerb radii) and Condition 24 (Loading bays on High Street South) of planning permission reference 18/6645/FUL, (dated 18 March 2019) in relation to the construction of Highways and Public Realm associated with the delivery of Phase 1 (South) sub-phase of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area (F/04687/13).Discharge in respect of Condition 11 (detailed designs of the kerb radii) and Condition 24 (Loading bays on High Street South) is sought only to the extent of the highways and public realm as shown on plan titled 'PLANNING BOUNDARY PLAN (18/6645/FUL)' dated 11/01/2013 (submitted alongside this application).
site_name: Land In The Vicinity Of Claremont Way, Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London
